metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24021 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Incorrect handling of '\0' bytes in file uploads in ModSecurity before 2.9.7 may allow for Web Application Firewall bypasses and buffer over-reads on the Web Application Firewall when executing rules that read the FILES_TMP_CONTENT collection.

criterions.comment: modsecurity-apache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
